hero.title: Tool to streamline your video production pipeline
hero.description: Suggestions to your new uploads and managing your channel's access won't get easier than this.

feature_section.subtitle: Upload faster
feature_section.title: Everything you need to upload your new video

features.name: Merge to upload
features.description: If you know what git flow is you exactly know what this tool's about. You'll get comfortable real quick.

features.name: Secure
features.description: You finally have a tool to manage access you your channel in a way that gives you security and doesn't restrain your flow.

features.name: Simple flow
features.description: We didn't invent anything new, we took something that works and translated it to a new area.

features.name: We don't track you
features.description: We store as little about you as necessary, your access keys are encrypted.

pricing_plans.title: Small channel
pricing_plans.description: The essentials for running a small or an up and comming channel.

pricing_plans.title: Small network of channels
pricing_plans.description: Everything you need to manage small organization.

pricing_plans.title: Enterprise
pricing_plans.description: A plan tailored to the exact needs of your company.
features: Everything in Small network of channels
